attributes.action: Require the government to provide proper guidance for uni-students during COVID
attributes.additional_details: Being at university is arguably one of the most important parts of a persons life, and it has been heavily impacted by the COVID-19 outbreak, the government fails time and time again during their covid briefings to give guidance to us students, so I would like them to start including guidance for us.
attributes.background: During the whole CORONAVIRUS pandemic, university students have been neglected, given no guidance or support, we request that the government provides an official statement providing support and some clarity for university students

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what specific guidance you would like the Government to provide. You can find information for students from the Office for Students here:
https://www.officeforstudents.org.uk/for-students/student-guide-to-coronavirus/?priority-taxon=b350e61d-1db9-4cc2-bb44-fab02882ac25
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
